chemaxon.marvin.modules
Class MacroMolecule.Component

java.lang.Object
  chemaxon.marvin.modules.MacroMolecule.Component
Direct Known Subclasses:
MacroMolecule.HeteroComponent, MacroMolecule.Polymer
Enclosing class:
MacroMolecule
public class MacroMolecule.Component
extends java.lang.Object

The Component class represents any kind of molecular structure connected by covalent bonds.
The main aim of this component is to provide a generic base class for all types of components found in a MacroMolecule (e.g. plymer chain, ligand etc.)

getAtomCount

public int getAtomCount()
Gets the total number of atom in the component. This is a theoretical value, not all atoms are neccessarily defined (by coordinates).

Returns:
total number of atoms of the Component

getDefinedAtomCount

public int getDefinedAtomCount()
Gets the number of atoms actually defined in the Component. An atom in this context is defined if 3D coordinates of the atom are available.

Returns:
number of atoms of the Component defined by 3D coordinates

getHydrogenCount

public int getHydrogenCount()
Gets the number of hydrogens atoms in the Component.

Returns:
therotical number of hydrogens present in the Component

Parameters:
atomSerialNumber - serial number of the atom as defined in the PDB file
Returns:
